Articles.Content: Hello folks! I would like to add a few more dishes to my game, for the sake of variety, if i add remote tech, how do i disable that but keep it's dishes for use with antenna range? Has anyone done this yet? And does it throw up any bugs? My game is already quite full of mods.

delete the RemoteTech.dll from the Plugins folder.

that should keep the parts, but disable any RemoteTech specific functionality
It works but they don't appear to have any range stats for AR... thanks anyway.

It works but they don't appear to have any range stats for AR... thanks anyway.

Try here https://github.com/Mecripp/AntennaRange-Patch/blob/master/RT2-AntennaRange%20Patch.

Try here https://github.com/Mecripp/AntennaRange-Patch/blob/master/RT2-AntennaRange%20Patch.

Ahhh! That looks promising!

- - - Updated - - -

Just put that into /gamedata?
I can't get the stats up for them in the VAB unless i leave in the rt.dll. I shall just run RT with signal delay disabled.

If you want to use the RT dishes with AntennaRange you need to zip up or delete the RT Plugin folder and all the CFG that came with RT and put his cfg in KSP/GameData https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/AntennaRange3.cfg.zip
